meanings.definition: A person who shares a house or apartment with others.
meanings.sent1: My housemate is always borrowing my clothes without asking.
meanings.sent2: I have a new housemate moving in next week.
meanings.sent3: My housemate thought my pet goldfish was a new roommate!
meanings.sent4: Living with a messy housemate can feel like living in a tornado.
meanings.sent5: Having a considerate housemate can make daily life much more enjoyable.

meanings.definition: To share a house or apartment with others.
meanings.sent1: I currently housemate with two friends from college.
meanings.sent2: We decided to housemate to save money on rent.
meanings.sent3: Let's housemate together and split the bills evenly.
meanings.sent4: Housemating with strangers can be a fun adventure.
meanings.sent5: We agreed to housemate until we each find our own place.
